results.title: Whimsical Garden decor, inspiring stones with inscription: “Live well-Laugh often-Love much" unique Garden art
results.description:
"Live well, Laugh often, Love much"....

These words are beautifully inscribed on a set of terracotta garden stones.

Decorated with deeply inscribed flowers, butterflies and ferns to give a sense of sweetness.

Poem stones will add a touch of whimsy to any garden or doorstep.

The wording is done in a charming vintage font that combines well with the old fashioned floral designs which are impressed and carved into the surface.
 
This message would be a charming touch along any pathway.

The size of each stone is approx. 4" x 6" and 1 thick, a nice size to tuck anywhere.

~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Poemstones are formed by hand with a unique terracotta that is formulated for architecture.

Solid and strong much like brick, these stones may be left outdoors in a permanent location and enjoyed for years.

The natural light color of the terracotta will age beautifully.
Black glaze shows the details clearly.

Add an artistic touch to your garden with a Poemstone ~ 
Many more phrases are available in my shop, take a look!

https://www.etsy.com/shop/Poemstones

results.title: 5.5 inch wide Live Laugh Drive over stuff (3 styles to choose from) vinyl decal
results.description:
5.5 inch wide Live Laugh Drive over stuff vinyl decal



 Instructions:

1.  Clean the surface thoroughly with soapy water (a couple of drops of dish washing liquid in a 500ml spray bottle should do) then dry with a cloth. Measure and mark the exact spot where your sticker is going. 

2.   Position your sticker in place using the masking tape, leaving one end free. If the sticker is too long, you can place the masking tape in the center and do it in 2 steps.

3.   Peel back the application tape gently, making sure the sticker is stuck on it. Discard the backing sheet. (Cut half of the backing sheet with scissors if you need to)

4.   Hold the sticker from the free end and pull tightly close to the surface but don't let it touch the surface yet.  

5.   With the squeegee in the other hand, start applying some pressure on the sticker towards the inside, in an up and down movement until you reach the end. Remember to keep an eye on the alignment of your sticker. 

6.   Run the squeegee along your sticker a few more times with more pressure to achieve strong adhesion.

7.   Peel back the application tape gently, making sure not to peel the sticker off with it.

8.   If any air bubbles appear, you can pierce the edge with a needle and force the air out with your finger and that's it , you're all done.

results.title: Funny Farmhouse Sign - Ope Smile Apologize - Handmade with Hardwood Frame
results.description:
Dislike cliches? Awkward much? Midwestern a little? All of the above? Here's your sign…

Made entirely from top-quality hardwoods, no Home Depot lumber here folks… you have a choice of a white oak, cherry, maple, or mahogany frame. Finished with a plant-based furniture butter (note, it’s not actually butter) that pulls out the natural tones and colors of the wood. The background is constructed from high-quality 1/4” Baltic Birch plywood and painted to look just a wee bit distressed. Comes with a pre-installed sawtooth hanger for easy installation in any part of your home that needs just a touch of Midwestern sarcasm.

Because the majority of the sign comes from natural materials the item in the pictures will not look exactly 100% like the item you receive. Grain patterns, features, colors, etc. can vary a bit from piece to piece and even from one side of the wood to the other. These spiffy hunks of timber are handcrafted with great attention to detail but they’re still as unique as a unicorn on a leap day.

Included in the box along with the sign is an explanation of the origins of “Ope” and what makes it such a wonderful word to use in any less than graceful situation. Makes a great gift for the Midwesterner, nerd, or other socially awkward person in your life.

Handmade from quality hardwoods, paint, and dry humor
23.5 x 10.5 x 1.13” (597 x 267 x 29 mm)
2.5 lbs. (1.13 kg)

****Giving Back****

At Charlie + Wobbs, trees are kinda our thing. Not only do trees provide the beautiful pieces of wood that goes into all of our products, but they also help provide the cardboard our boxes are made from, the paper packing material to keep everything safe during shipment, the cardstock our flyers are printed on, the paper towels used during production, and most importantly, the air we breathe just to be alive. We'd kinda be up a creek without a paddle, wooden or otherwise, without them. When properly managed, trees are an amazing and 100% renewable resource... really the ultimate renewable resource; products derived from them literally grow on trees! And to help preserve them Charlie + Wobbs pledges to donate one percent of the revenue of every order to non-profit organizations whose missions are sustainable forestry and mitigating the effects of climate change. This way we can help keep the forests of the world growing forward.

results.title: Gem stone Metal charms, Crochet Stitch Markers
results.description:
Set of4 hand made antique silver stitch markers. 

Set includes 4 gemstone charm stitch markers with lever back clasps.


Art Metal Stitch Markers are small pieces designed to make note of crochet or knit stitches so you never lose your place!

Progress keepers. 

The markers come in loop style with teapot themed designs, so you can keep track of stitch increases and decreases, knit and purls, and other important pattern benchmarks. Makes  knitting a smooth and easy activity!

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------
SHIPPING :::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::
---------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Our current shipping method is USPS Priority Mail to anywhere in the United States. This shipping service generally takes 2-3 business days to most of the US (that's all it says on the USPS website). We will usually ship your item within 2 business days, but due to every order being custom cut in custom colors, it may take up to 2-5 business days for your item to ship, and even longer on larger items. However, we do send a shipping confirmation upon shipping the item.

International orders will be shipped in the same 2-5 business day period, but will take a bit longer to get to you. We ship all international orders via USPS First Class Mail and it can take 10-20 business days (possibly longer) for you to receive your item. 

***INTERNATIONAL ORDERS MAY HAVE A CUSTOMS FEE. THIS IS AN IMPORT TAX PLACED BY YOUR COUNTRY THAT IS NOT INCLUDED IN OUR INTERNATIONAL SHIPPING FEES.***

----------------------------------------------------------------------------
CUSTOMIZE IT :::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::
----------------------------------------------------------------------------
You want to buy but you'd like a different size? Or additional colors? No Problem! Contact us for a quote with you specifications and we'll send you a proof and setup a custom listing, just for you.

----------------------------------------------------------------------------
WHY CHOOSE US :::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::
----------------------------------------------------------------------------
➭ Designed and made in the USA
➭ We use high quality commercial wall vinyl that has a matte finish so it looks painted on
➭ We ship USPS Priority within the US so you should receive your item 2-3 days after shipping
➭ We ship most orders within 2 business days (a bit longer on the very large items)
➭ We provide a FREE installation squeegee and detailed instructions to make application a breeze.
